Row.Text: Display Squad Number on Unit Flags

Enter management mode, where units can be added or removed with [COLOR_YELLOW]LCLICK[ENDCOLOR] on the unit or their flag. Groups of units can be added to a squad at once by holding [COLOR_YELLOW]RCLICK[ENDCOLOR] and dragging a box over units to be added. Management mode can also be entered using the key combination [COLOR_YELLOW]CTRL+NUM[ENDCOLOR] where num is the squad number key.

Enter movement mode, where [COLOR_YELLOW]RCLICK[ENDCOLOR] on a plot will issue move orders to all units in that squad to move to that area. Movement mode can also be entered for a squad by double tapping the number key corresponding to a squad.
Remove all units from this squad. Units can be removed individually from this squad with [COLOR_YELLOW]RCLICK[ENDCOLOR] on the unit list.
